com.github.dandelion.datatables.core.view
Class AbstractDatatablesView

java.lang.Object
  com.github.dandelion.datatables.core.view.AbstractDatatablesView

public abstract class AbstractDatatablesView
extends Object

Abstract base class for all view implementations used in export.

Provides support for static attributes and utilities, to be made available to the view.

Highly inspired by the AbstractView Spring class, written by Rod Johnson and Juergen Hoeller.

Author:
Thibault Duchateau

Constructor Detail

AbstractDatatablesView

Method Detail

setContentType

public void setContentType(String contentType)
Set the content type for this view. Default is "text/html;charset=ISO-8859-1".

May be ignored by subclasses if the view itself is assumed to set the content type, e.g. in case of JSPs.

getContentType

public String getContentType()
Return the content type for this view.

writeToResponse

protected void writeToResponse(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                               ByteArrayOutputStream baos)
                        throws IOException
Write the given temporary OutputStream to the HTTP response.

Parameters:
response - current HTTP response
baos - the temporary OutputStream to write
Throws:
IOException - if writing/flushing failed

writeToResponse

protected void writeToResponse(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                               ByteArrayOutputStream baos,
                               String title,
                               String contentType)
                        throws IOException
Write the given temporary OutputStream to the HTTP response as an Attachment with the given title.

Parameters:
response - current HTTP response
baos - the temporary OutputStream to write
title - the title of the attachment
Throws:
IOException - if writing/flushing failed
